p: Response: we did not have any data of detecting viral RNAs/antigens in specimens of seropositive patients, but we did have data on enterovirus-related ( HFMD or herpangina) history of seropositive children in Table 2. For example, 34% of seropositive preschool children had history of HFMD and 24% had history of herpangina (Table 2).
